import React from "react"; import "./History.css"; import "./Card.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Cookies from "universal-cookie"; import { BiDetail } from "react-icons/bi"; import { AiOutlineCalendar, AiOutlineHome, AiOutlineMail, AiOutlinePhone, } from "react-icons/ai"; import { RiMoneyEuroCircleLine } from "react-icons/ri"; import { MdOutlineDeliveryDining } from "react-icons/md"; import { FaWineBottle } from "react-icons/fa"; import { BsFillPersonFill, BsCreditCard, BsQuestionOctagon, } from "react-icons/bs"; import { dateFormater, addDays } from "./Functions/functions"; import { Table, Row, Col, Modal, Button, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const History = () => { const [history, setHistory] = useState([]); const [orderSelected, setOrderSelected] = useState([]); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const cookies = new Cookies(); var userEmail = cookies.get("email"); let historyUrl = useHistory(); const getHistory = () => { fetch(`http://localhost:4000/getHistory/${userEmail}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => { console.log(json); setHistory(json); }); }; useEffect(() => { getHistory(); }, []); return (
{orderSelected.length !== 0 && ( <>

Order Details


 Order Id : {orderSelected[0]._id} Order Date :{" "} {orderSelected[0].OrderDate.slice(0, 10)}
Total Price : {orderSelected[0].Price} â‚¬ Shipping Date :{" "} {orderSelected[0].OrderDate.slice(0, 10)}
Order Send status{" "} {orderSelected[0].HasBeenSend ? "Pending..." : "On Storage"}   Order Delivered status{" "} {orderSelected[0].HasBeenDelivered ? "Delivered" : "No Delivered"}  
Payment Kind :{" "} {orderSelected[0].KindPayment} Address :{" "} {orderSelected[0].Address}
Zip : {orderSelected[0].Zip} Email :{" "} {orderSelected[0].Email}
Phone :{" "} {orderSelected[0].Phone} Name :{" "} {orderSelected[0].FirstName} {orderSelected[0].LastName}

Wines


{orderSelected[0].Wines.map((wine) => ( <> { historyUrl.push("/wine/" + wine.wine._id); }} > {wine.wine.WineName}

{wine.wine.Type} ,{wine.wine.Color} , {wine.wine.Year}{" "}

Amount : {wine.amount}

))} )}
WineLovers Website - Previous Order
{" "}
{history.length !== 0 && ( <> {history.map((historyy) => ( Order Id: {historyy._id}
Date:{" "} {historyy.OrderDate.slice(0, 10)}

{ handleShow(); for (const key in history) { if (history[key]._id === historyy._id) { setOrderSelected([history[key]]); } } }} />


{historyy.Wines.map((wine) => (

• {wine.wine.WineName}

))} ))}
Order Details
)}













); }; export default History;
